diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Acute pancreatitis s/p ERCP for Choledocholithiasis (procedure not successful at removing CBD stone)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with dysphagia and choledocholithiasis, with imaging showing a distal CBD stone. An attempt at ERCP was made, which was unsuccessful due to an extremely stenotic papilla. The clinical findings and imaging results support the diagnosis of acute pancreatitis.
